review: WOW!! This shirt is an amazing spirit orgy of wolves and Mr. Moon. I can't help but get the pee shivers everytime I put this heavenly garment on. I knew it was special, but had no idea how special until I received it. I used to have the "beatis" but when I put this shirt on...It disappeared faster than my bottle of Ten High. God bless you spirit wolves!
productTitle: The Mountain Men's Three Wolf Moon Short Sleeve Tee
